title: The Editors -- Episode 170: Dunking on the NBA
text:
Houston Rockets guard James Harden drives against two Memphis Grizzlies players at the Toyota Center in Houston, Texas, January 14, 2019. (Troy Taormina / Reuters)

Today on The Editors, Rich, Charlie, David, and Jim discuss impeachment indecision, China and the NBA, and sobering developments in Syria.

Editors’ Picks:

Light Items:

Rich: The battery power on his iPhone 11.

Charlie: Playing guitar with my kids.

David: The British Are Coming by Rick Atkinson.

Jim: The Babylon Bee.

Ad Music:

Dvorak Polka by Kevin MacLeod is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution license.

Source | Artist

The Editors is hosted by Rich Lowry and produced by Sarah Schutte.
description: Rich, Charlie, David, and Jim discuss impeachment indecision, China and the NBA, and sobering developments in Syria.
